sentences.sContent: Try making a note of the things that annoy you.
sentences.sCn: 试着把让你心烦的事记下来。

sentences.sContent: It annoyed me that I didn't have time to do more ironing.
sentences.sCn: 没有时间熨更多的衣服让我心烦了。

words.tran: 恼人地；烦人地；令人不快地（annoying的副词形式）

remMethod.val: an(一个) ＋ no ＋ y(看作yes) → 求婚时， 一个no或yes使男人们或苦恼或狂喜 → 使恼怒

trans.tranOther: If someone or something annoys you, it makes you fairly angry and impatient
